A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is an incredible film- honoring the truest sense of the Star Wars legacy. It is action packed\, fun\, snarky at times\, has a great score and story line\, and continues the best Star Wars has always offered- with upgrades! My daughter\, brother\, and boyfriend all loved it\, and we have seen it multiple times in the theater.  You're gonna love it (unless you're a racist\, misogynistic terd). \nEnjoy!
